description: Gateshead sign forward Jordan Preston on a one-year deal following the expiry of his contract at Guiseley.
title: Jordan Preston: Gateshead sign Guiseley forward on one-year deal
title_page: Jordan Preston: Gateshead sign Guiseley forward on one-year deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Gateshead have signed forward Jordan Preston on a one-year deal following the expiry of his contract at Guiseley.
Preston, 21, scored seven goals for the Lions last season to retain their National League status following his move from Blackburn Rovers last summer.
The ex-Rovers academy player also scored 12 goals while on loan to Ayr United in 2015-16.
"It's a good opportunity for coming coming back to full-time football." Preston said.
"The manager has spoken very highly of the club and our ambitions for the coming season."
